definition: see 一著不慎，滿盤皆輸|一着不慎，满盘皆输[yi1 zhao1 bu4 shen4 , man3 pan2 jie1 shu1]

plate/dish/tray/board/hard drive (computing)/to build/to coil/to check/to examine/to transfer (property)/to make over/classifier for food: dish, helping/to coil/classifier for coils of wire/classifier for games of chess
to lose/to transport/to donate/to enter (a password)
One careless move and the whole game is lost. (idiom)
pinyin: yi1 zhao1 bu4 shen4 , man3 pan2 jie1 shu1

sentences.english: Thus, even if some of the investment losses, not worth.
sentences.chinese: 這樣，即使一些投資受了損失，也不致於滿盤皆輸。

sentences.english: Good returns are high, it may worth worse.
sentences.chinese: 好則回報高，差則可能滿盤皆輸。

sentences.english: To his rue, the error cost him the game.
sentences.chinese: 讓他後悔的是，這個錯誤讓他滿盤皆輸。

sentences.english: One step wrong will be the loser of the situation, I did not take the power.
sentences.chinese: 一步錯就將是滿盤皆輸的局面，我沒有承擔的力量。

sentences.english: A right move now is the premise of"whole loss" in the future.
sentences.chinese: 現在正確的一着，是以後滿盤皆輸的前提。
